snippet: Tony Blair, the former British prime minister, remains defined by many for his steadfast support of President George W. Bush and the invasion of Iraq.
abstract: Legacy of former British Prime Min Tony Blair continues to be haunted by his unwavering support of Pres George W Bush during Iraq war; issue has arisen again in face of violence sweeping Iraq, prompting Blair to defend his actions and to insist that 2003 invasion of Iraq by United States, Great Britain and allies has little to do with new wave of Sunni-Shiite violence.
lead_paragraph: Tony Blair, the former British prime minister, remains defined by many for his steadfast support of President George W. Bush and the invasion of Iraq.

headline.main: Out of Power Almost 7 Years, Blair Is Still Haunted by a Legacy of War
headline.print_headline: Out of Power Almost 7 Years, Blair Is Still Haunted by a Legacy of War
